body:
Overview

The Candidates list shows information about all the candidates who have been invited to take the test. It includes candidates at different stages of the testing process and allows you to easily view each candidate's entries and reports in one location.

Supporting Licenses

  • Recruiter
  • Developer

Accessing Candidates List

  • Select a test from the list for which you want to view the candidates information.
  • On the test page click on the Candidates tab as highlighted in the below screenshot. 
  • Now you can access the list of candidates who have historically been invited or participated in that particular test. 
  • If you are looking to find a specific candidate, you can use the search functionality to search them by their name or email address. 
  • You can search for a candidate by their name or email address using the search bar. 

  • The left pane of the page provides filters that allow you to perform precise searches. By applying these filters, you can refine your search criteria and narrow down the results to find the specific information you need.
  • The available default filters are:
    • Candidate Status: Enables you to filter the candidates by their test status such as passed, failed, In progress, to be evaluated etc…  
    • Total Score: This filter enables you to set a range of score to filter the candidates fallin in that score zone. 
    • Invited By: This filter enables you to filter the candidates invited by you vs the ones who joined using the public url.  
    • Invited On: This filter lets you find the candidates invited between a particular time frame. 
    • Invitation expiry date: This filter enables you to find the candidates whose Invitation expired on a certain date.  
  • You can also add a separate filter by clicking the Add Filter from the filters section.

  • You can also select the desired candidates and download their data in PD For Excel formats using the Export functionality. 

Accessing Candidate Reports

From the Candidates List page you can also access their reports, here is how you can do it: 

  • To access a candidate's report click on their name from the list.
  • You can access two types of reports for each candidate. 
    • Summary Report: Upon clicking a candidate's name, their Summary Report will appear on the right side of your screen. It provides you with detailed reporting and insights to help you understand how a candidate performs in their test. 
    • Detailed Reports: The Detailed Report allows you to thoroughly review the candidate's responses and the time spent on each question. You can access a candidate's actual answers and detailed performance insights by clicking either the question name or the "View detailed" option as shown in the below screenshot.
title: Candidates List in HackerRank Tests
